name: Simple Spy
description:
Simple Spy is a dynamic and minimalist 2d platformer. Though Simple Spy is a minimalist platformer,you can also find all fun and essence needed for a full fledged platformer. everything in Simple Spy is achieved through a combination of three action such as running,jumping and rolling.the main focus of the game is simplicity with hard core gameplay and unique game features and obstacles.features
  • Explore 75 levels and 5 bonus levels
  • 6 different character with unique animation to unlock
  • Challenging gameplay based on color changing platform.
  • Minimalist Levels but Hardcore gameplay
